# CodableWithConfiguration

**Type Alias**

A type that can convert itself into and out of an external representation with the help of a configuration that handles encoding contained types.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias CodableWithConfiguration = DecodableWithConfiguration & EncodableWithConfiguration
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/CodableWithConfiguration] is a type alias for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/EncodableWithConfiguration] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/DecodableWithConfiguration] protocols. Use this protocol to support codability in a type that can’t conform to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Codable] by itself, but can do so with additional statically-defined configuration provided by a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/CodableConfiguration] instance.

[doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedString] uses this approach to allow an instance to contain arbitrary attributes, including frameworks outside of Foundation or the platform SDK. It does this by including one or more [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScope] instances, a type that conforms to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/EncodingConfigurationProviding] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/DecodingConfigurationProviding]. An attribute scope like [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/SwiftUIAttributes] defines attribute keys, and conforms to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScope] to provide configuration instances that know the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedStringKey] types and their associated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedStringKey/Value] types. With this type information, an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributedString] can encode all of its attributes, even from frameworks other than Foundation.

## Serializing Arbitrary Payloads

- **CodableConfiguration**: A property wrapper that makes a type codable, by supplying a configuration that provides additional information for serialization.
- **DecodableWithConfiguration**: A protocol for types that support decoding when supplied with an additional configuration type.
- **DecodingConfigurationProviding**: A protocol whose conformers provide a configuration instance to help decode types that don’t support encoding by themselves.
- **EncodableWithConfiguration**: A protocol for types that support encoding when supplied with an additional configuration type.
- **EncodingConfigurationProviding**: A protocol whose conformers provide a configuration instance to help encode types that don’t support encoding by themselves.
